title: Strengthening Business Practical Skills: Project-Based Blended Learning Reform in Electrical Control Training Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Enhance system design capabilities by solving real-world industrial electrical control problems through project-based learning.
Strengthen competencies in analyzing and implementing complex control systems by applying a step-by-step instructional approach (foundational-applied-integrated).

Learners will diagnose five types of industrial equipment failure scenarios using VR simulation tools (e.g., Siemens Plant Simulation) and pass a practical evaluation by performing at least seven of eight standard maintenance procedures with 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
